name: Default Twitter Image for Yoast
author: Jb Audras @ Whodunit

sections.description:

With the famous Yoast SEO plugin, there is currently no way to easily set up a default Twitter Open graph image for your posts that don‚Äôt have any thumbnail image.

Yoast allows you to define a default image for Facebook, but there‚Äôs no such option for Twitter. It‚Äôs really helpful be able to choose a specific image for each social network so you can better customize your communication on them.

This very light free plugin add a default Twitter image field in the Twitter tab, under the SEO > Social submenu.
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin and activate it in your WordPress Admin.
  2. Go to the “SEO” menu then to the “Social” submenu.
  3. Go to the “Twitter” tab then set up you default Open graph image.
